Replacing or Enhancing Zero-Knowledge Proofs (ZK)

There are two types of ML FHE

Confidential inference

(operations of encrypted neural network)

The trained neural network and user queries remain encrypted throughout the process

Confidential AI training

Addresses the needs of various market participants by allowing them to train AI models on encrypted data, ensuring that the datasets, models, and user queries remain secure and proprietary. FHE allows owners of datasets, models, and queries to protect their assets from theft

Use cases

Blog

Biotech AI for drug development

Handles large, expensive datasets and models under heavy regulation, ensuring secure data sharing and collaboration

Science AI
Intellectual property AI
Fintech AI
Military AI

Where FHE can it be useful?

Finance

In the financial industry, FHE can be used to protect financial transactions and customer data when processing payments and financial transactions

Cybersecurity

Computer security is a section of information security that characterizes the impossibility of damage to a computer exceeding the amount of damage

Science & Development

FHE is used in research and development to ensure privacy and security when processing sensitive data
